meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Pat Rounds Dan Schaffer Frank Hughes Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #530.

td.p: Pat Rounds, a sales trainer from Silver Spring, Maryland
Dan Schaffer, a high school teacher from San Diego, California
Frank Hughes, an account executive from Torrance, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $20,401)

tr.td: FAMOUS PAIRS
MAGAZINE COVERS
MUSIC ON THE MAP
NATURAL RESOURCES
BOWLING
(Alex: And another in our continuing series featuring curriculum...)
"F" IN FRENCH

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_5_2', 'clue_J_5_2_stuck', '(Alex: Am I correct in assuming that none of you bowl, because we can cancel this first round right now and just chat for the next 20 seconds or so?
[Audience laughter.]
(Alex: Dan, you want to go to 3...)
[End-of-round signal sounds.]
(Alex: Thank you. Thank you. Well, there goes our perfect game.)
[Alex forgets to give the correct response.]

7-10

Triple Stumper
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Frank
Dan
Pat
WORLD WAR II
FASHION HISTORY
(Alex: Another in our continuing series on U.S. states, this one having to do with the famous people of...)
NORTH DAKOTA
MOVIES
ART
LOST LETTERS
(Alex: This last category is not about the kind of letters you mail, it's about letters of the alphabet that become lost for one reason or another. Cryptic enough?)
